hits.name: Million.js
hits.long_description:
Million.js is an open source tool that makes React.js 70% faster.

We want to make Million a web embed that allows developers to select and ask why parts of a page are slow and automatically generate a GitHub pull request with a fix using AI.

Today, most developers spend weeks trying to comprehend flame graphs and execution traces, debug with frustration, and give up. We realized that web developers donâ€™t want to put the grimy work to make their app performant. Instead, we fix performance issues automatically, with no migration.

Our end goal is to make all applications automatically fast, starting from frontend to backend, and eventually mobile apps & infrastructure.
hits.one_liner: Copilot for optimizing web performance

long_description.value:
Million.js is an open source tool that makes React.js 70% faster.

We want to make Million a web embed that allows developers to select and ask why parts of a page are slow and automatically generate a GitHub pull request with a fix using AI.

Today, most developers spend weeks trying to comprehend flame graphs and execution traces, debug with frustration, and give up. We realized that web developers donâ€™t want to put the grimy work to make their app performant. Instead, we fix performance issues automatically, with no migration.

Our end goal is to make all applications automatically fast, starting from frontend to backend, and eventually mobile apps & infrastructure.

one_liner.value: Copilot for optimizing web performance

hits.name: InspectMind AI
hits.long_description: InspectMind AI is revolutionizing the field of inspections across various industries with its innovative AI-driven platform, starting with construction industry. Our platform simplifies the documentation process, seamlessly integrating photos, videos, and notes into comprehensive reports, thereby reducing manual effort and time for inspectors. InspectMind AI's core mission is to streamline the inspection process, ensuring safety, compliance, and reliability, thus empowering inspectors to focus on their expertise while we handle the intricacies of data analysis and reporting. With InspectMind AI, inspections become more efficient, accurate, and hassle-free, contributing to higher standards of safety and quality in every industry we touch.
hits.one_liner: AI copilot for efficient and reliable inspections

one_liner.value: AI copilot for efficient and reliable inspections

hits.name: Konstructly
hits.long_description:
We are preventing overspend in construction by bridging the gap between those responsible for the payments in construction (commercial) and those responsible for completing and managing the build (production). 

We digitise invoicing and payment approvals and connect them to the respective quality checks of the works, trade handovers and live progress. All of which are currently managed by unlinked, separate processes and data structures. 

We not only streamline manual processes, provide unparalleled visibility and even solve regulatory requirements, we drive productivity from the supply chain using the ultimate incentive - cash.
hits.one_liner: Making construction payments more efficient

long_description.value:
We are preventing overspend in construction by bridging the gap between those responsible for the payments in construction (commercial) and those responsible for completing and managing the build (production).

hits.name: Magic Hour
hits.long_description:
Magic Hour is building tools to enable a new generation of AI-first creators.

Video is the most viral content format, but making engaging video content is complex and time consuming.

We started Magic Hour with the goal of bringing advancements in AI video technology to all consumers.

Since then, we've launched a web application that allows users to generate videos in multiple styles, including animations, video-to-video, face swap, and text-to-video. You can use the product at https://magichour.ai. 

Our videos have reached hundreds of millions of views on social media, and in our next iteration, we're combining creation and consumption by building the TikTok for AI video.
hits.one_liner: Platform for AI video generation.

long_description.value:
Magic Hour is building tools to enable a new generation of AI-first creators.

Video is the most viral content format, but making engaging video content is complex and time consuming.

We started Magic Hour with the goal of bringing advancements in AI video technology to all consumers.

Since then, we've launched a web application that allows users to generate videos in multiple styles, including animations, video-to-video, face swap, and text-to-video. You can use the product at https://magichour.ai. 

Our videos have reached hundreds of millions of views on social media, and in our next iteration, we're combining creation and consumption by building the TikTok for AI video.

one_liner.value: Platform for AI video generation.

hits.name: Lumona
hits.long_description:
At Lumona, we're transforming the way people search online. 

Searching should be effortless for any question, no matter if the answer is buried in the depths of the internet, whether it be in a niche subreddit or from a sea of TikTok videos. However, options for finding this information are subpar at best. The search features of social media platforms often fail to guide users effectively, leading them to creatively use traditional search engines by adding terms like 'reddit' to their queries in an effort to uncover more relevant results. This â€œhackyâ€ solution only searches Reddit when a more accurate answer or crucial context may lie somewhere else that requires additional searches to find. Moreover, the prevalence of misinformation adds another layer of complexity, as unverified data and prioritized SEO-driven results can mislead users.

LLMs have enabled the automatic ingestion and understanding of huge amounts of information. Instead of summarizing links from existing search techniques, our approach is to use LLMs to mirror the structure of information on the internet itself, creating an internet of LLMs that are experts on the content you are looking for. This approach allows fact-checking, additional context, and up-to-date information about the topic to be added to search results.

We're a group of 3 MIT students with internships at companies like Google, Stripe, Matroid, and Reddit who started work on Lumona in September 2023 after winning HackMIT. We have experience planning, building, and shipping new features and projects from start to finish in diverse company environments. Growing up in the age of social media, we are poised to tackle the ever-widening gap between current search solutions and our needs.
hits.one_liner: Transforming search by building an internet of AI experts.

long_description.value:

hits.name: Basepilot
hits.long_description:
Basepilot enables SaaS tools to easily build their own product copilots. It's an embedded chatbot that allows users of a product to find answers and take actions within the product, just by chatting to it.

Basepilot helps companies increase adoption and simplify how users operate a product.

It's super easy to set up and is deployable anywhere in 1 line of code. We support API and Non-API functions.

Interested to try it out? Get started here: https://www.basepilot.com/
hits.one_liner: Create a copilot for your product with no-code.

hits.name: Retell AI
hits.long_description:
API for creating interactive voice agents with magical conversational and execution skills, designed to help you build the next generation of voice products. 

From AI-powered call agents to voice-enabled coaching apps and lifelike companions, we are your trusted ally in turning these visions into reality.

Although Voice AI has been around for some time, it hasn't yet become effective enough for mainstream use, primarily because of poor user experience. Conversational flows often feel awkward with unnatural pauses and interruptions, requests are frequently misunderstood, and voices sound robotic or overly dramatic. On top of that, setting up such a Voice AI system can require upwards of 100 hours of frustrating development.

By offering a truly conversational, fast, and empathetic Voice AI that can be easily configured for any industry and integrated into any product, we aim to push the boundary of user-friendliness to a new level, reaching the threshold for mainstream adoption of Voice AI.

We are at a pivotal moment in history where Voice AI will become the primary interface for accessing products and services, revolutionizing our interactions with machines for the better.

Retell AI is at the forefront of creating this new reality.
hits.one_liner: Build Interactive Voice Agents Into Your Product

long_description.value:

Grow your knowledge base and replay previous workflows. 

We are fully open source - star us at https://github.com/stackwiseai/stackwise. If you're interesting in contributing, we'd be happy to help you get started!

hits.name: Stacksync
hits.long_description:
Stacksync powers real-time and bidirectional data synchronization between CRMs (e.g. Salesforce, Hubspot or SAP) and databases (e.g. Postgres, Google BigQuery,...). Edits made in your CRM will instantly update in your Database, and vice-versa. To set up a sync, users simply have to connect the two chosen apps in one click and select the tables they want to sync, no-code!
Stacksync reduces implementation delays from months to minutes for CRM integration projects and removes all the complexity behind CRM new feature development. We show a 90% improvement on delivery time and budget.
hits.one_liner: Real-time and two-way sync between CRMs and Databases

long_description.value:
Stacksync powers real-time and bidirectional data synchronization between CRMs (e.g. Salesforce, Hubspot or SAP) and databases (e.g. Postgres, Google BigQuery,...). Edits made in your CRM will instantly update in your Database, and vice-versa. To set up a sync, users simply have to connect the two chosen apps in one click and select the tables they want to sync, no-code!
Stacksync reduces implementation delays from months to minutes for CRM integration projects and removes all the complexity behind CRM new feature development. We show a 90% improvement on delivery time and budget.

one_liner.value: Real-time and two-way sync between CRMs and Databases

hits.name: Lumina
hits.long_description:
Lumina leverages Deep Retrieval & Agentic AI to augment complex research tasks. Our current focus is discovery, extraction and curation from scientific journal articles. This helps our >8000 users create and interact with multiple knowledge bases for their research queries and writing tasks. Key features include cited answers, robust extraction tables, agentic search, and an interactive reading experience. 

Overtime - we will be augmenting the entire scientific process with AI.  This includes data analysis, experimentation (data generation) and generating complete articles. We aim to create a near AGI experience for researchers to speed up the rate of scientific progress. 

The team consists of 3 life-long friends. We've been roommates, bandmates, lab-partners and now co-founders. Collectively, our experience encompasses hard tech R&D, statistics, AI, and software engineering. These factors gave us a strong foundation for assisting the research community through neural nets.
hits.one_liner: AI Search Engine for Scientific Research

long_description.value:
Lumina leverages Deep Retrieval & Agentic AI to augment complex research tasks. Our current focus is discovery, extraction and curation from scientific journal articles. This helps our >8000 users create and interact with multiple knowledge bases for their research queries and writing tasks. Overtime - we will be augmenting the entire scientific process with AI.  This includes data analysis, experimentation (data generation) and generating complete articles. We aim to create a near AGI experience for researchers to speed up the rate of scientific progress. 

The team consists of 3 life-long friends. We've been roommates, bandmates, lab-partners and now co-founders. Collectively, our experience encompasses hard tech R&D, statistics, AI, and software engineering. These factors gave us a strong foundation for assisting the research community through neural nets.

one_liner.value: AI Search Engine for Scientific Research

hits.name: Shiboleth
hits.long_description:
Shiboleth unique algorithm detect  spam, fraud or deepfakes from extremely short audio snippets. This extremely low latency system allows integration to existing telephony and VOIP networks.

Nearly a quarter of all phone calls are spam or fraudulent. The problem is only getting worse with the rise of large language models (LLMs) and deep fake audio.

Initially we focused on deepfake protection for the elderly. We built a physical adapter that connects to legacy landlines and detects deep fake audio by beeping. We presented the device and algorithm at the last Blackhat.

Our GTM strategy is B2B audio spam solutions. However, in the longer term, we want to protect the consumers, starting with the elderly.
hits.one_liner: Detect Audio Fraud in Realtime. Including Deepfake.

long_description.value:
Shiboleth unique algorithm detect  spam, fraud or deepfakes from extremely short audio snippets. This extremely low latency system allows integration to existing telephony and VOIP networks.

Nearly a quarter of all phone calls are spam or fraudulent. The problem is only getting worse with the rise of large language models (LLMs) and deep fake audio.

Initially we focused on deepfake protection for the elderly. We built a physical adapter that connects to legacy landlines and detects deep fake audio by beeping. We presented the device and algorithm at the last Blackhat.

Our GTM strategy is B2B audio spam solutions. However, in the longer term, we want to protect the consumers, starting with the elderly.

one_liner.value: Detect Audio Fraud in Realtime. Including Deepfake.

hits.name: Carma
hits.long_description:
We are a marketplace enabling car owners to get same-day repair services with instant transparent offers and guaranteed pricing. Every year, car owners spend $573B on auto repairs globally.

Car owners send service requests through Carma to our highly-rated and vetted service center Partners, who respond with real-time offers. Car owners can compare multiple same-day service offers in 60 seconds or less. Carma handles the transaction.

Car owners save upwards of 50% when they use Carma vs. the median price for the same service in their zip code. It takes 30 seconds to add a car to your profile and request service.

We are currently accepting Carma for Business customers:

If you own multiple commercial vehicles for your business and are interested in trusted same-day turnaround for your fleet, contact us at 314-899-2886 or at fleets@joincarma.com.

If you are an owner of a highly-rated automotive service center and are interested in increasing revenue with more profitable high-ticket work, contact us at 314-899-2886 or at shops@joincarma.com.
hits.one_liner: Marketplace for Same-Day Auto Repair.

If you own multiple commercial vehicles for your business and are interested in trusted same-day turnaround for your fleet, contact us at 314-899-2886 or at fleets@joincarma.com.

If you are an owner of a highly-rated automotive service center and are interested in increasing revenue with more profitable high-ticket work, contact us at 314-899-2886 or at shops@joincarma.com.

one_liner.value: Marketplace for Same-Day Auto Repair.

hits.name: Preloop
hits.long_description:
Preloop is a ML feature platform that aims to automate the cataloging and productionization of features across diverse ML and data science workflows. We believe that current feature platforms require too much additional work; Preloop aims to make the process more automated and reliable. 

Our platform will automate the process of creating features that are fresh, and make it easy to build the infrastructure required to serve them. As more people recognize the benefits and practicality of using AI, we believe that the importance of a quick and easy to use feature platform will continue to rise.
hits.one_liner: Intelligent ML Feature Platform for Fast Moving ML and AI Teams

hits.name: Superagent.sh
hits.all_locations: Gothenburg, VÃ¤stra GÃ¶taland County, Sweden; Remote
hits.long_description:
Superagent allows developers to build AI-assistants and to embed them into their own applications. These AI-assistants are purpose built for a task at hand, e.g. sales or legal work, and can be equipped with custom knowledge, memory, and API connectivity.

It can be helpful to think of Superagent as an open source and multi model version of OpenAI Assistants API, but with full control over the customer experience. We also provide full auditability, privacy, and data security. Crucial for running AI-assistants in production.

We also provide a hosted service that allows developers to effortlessly deploy AI-assistants  without worrying about infrastructure, dependencies, or configuration.
hits.one_liner: The open framework for building AI-assistants

all_locations.value: Gothenburg, VÃ¤stra GÃ¶taland County, Sweden; Remote

hits.name: CodeAnt AI
hits.long_description:
Code Ant AI is a devtool that helps companies enforce clean code, effortlessly. It converts your existing code into highly scalable, optimised, and readable code, allowing your developers to dedicate more time to crafting new logic and less time to fixing or cleaning things up. It directly integrates with developer's IDE and CI tools.

Features of CodeAnt AI:
1) Detects and fixes 600+ Code Optimizations (CPU, Memory, Latency).
2) Detects and adds Scalability (Failure Retry, Delays, Rate-limiting, etc.) logic inside the code.
3) Removes Code Smells and adds Docstring, Unit tests, TypeHints with every code change.
hits.one_liner: Scale, Optimise & Enforce Clean Code, Effortlessly!

long_description.value:
Code Ant AI is a devtool that helps companies enforce clean code, effortlessly. It converts your existing code into highly scalable, optimised, and readable code, allowing your developers to dedicate more time to crafting new logic and less time to fixing or cleaning things up. It directly integrates with developer's IDE and CI tools.

Features of CodeAnt AI:
1) Detects and fixes 600+ Code Optimizations (CPU, Memory, Latency).

3) Removes Code Smells and adds Docstring, Unit tests, TypeHints with every code change.

one_liner.value: Scale, Optimise & Enforce Clean Code, Effortlessly!

hits.name: Draftaid
hits.long_description:
DraftAid is the world's first generative AI for CAD manufacturing drawings, akin to GitHub Copilot but for CAD. It drastically shortens drawing creation time, turning hours into seconds.

Every product that is manufactured - from construction to aerospace, automotive, durable goods, and electronicsâ€”relies on drawings. Currently, engineers and designers painstakingly make these essential drawings manually. Draftaid streamlines this process saving teams millions in time and quality. 

The idea was born out of Abdullah's experience as a mechanical design team member, where he created thousands of drawings and longed for a more efficient process. Partnering with Tahsin, a neighbour with a PhD in AI, and Mohammed, a seasoned engineering VP with experience in construction software, they turned the dream into reality.

Since their launch in August, DraftAid has engaged customers through targeted outreach and word-of-mouth, securing paid pilots with subsequent contracts valued at $150,000.

Be a part of ushering in the new era of CAD designs!
hits.one_liner: AI-copilot for manufacturing drawings

hits.name: OpenCopilot
hits.long_description:
â­ We are building a way to let your SaaS product's users chat with your product functionality and execute things just by text (natural language).

â­ It will give your product's users a new text-based interface that is much easier to interact with, the copilot will have access to your product's APIs, so it can call them and retrieve/add data to and from them.

â­ âž¡ï¸ For example, If Jira used OpenCopilot, Jira users could ask things like "Please create a new board, and then add new tickets about our payments migration project then assign X on it". So no more clicks on the UI, they can describe whatever they want to do via text. 

â­ âž¡ï¸ Most of your flows will be automatically handled (you do not need to configure it), or you can define them manually via our flows editor.

We are 100% open source with more than 2500 stars on GitHub!
hits.one_liner: Build an AI copilot for your own product

long_description.value:
â­ We are building a way to let your SaaS product's users chat with your product functionality and execute things just by text (natural language).

â­ It will give your product's users a new text-based interface that is much easier to interact with, the copilot will have access to your product's APIs, so it can call them and retrieve/add data to and from them.

We are 100% open source with more than 2500 stars on GitHub!

hits.name: Markprompt
hits.long_description:
Close customer support tickets faster with AI.

Weâ€™re building AI infrastructure to power customer support at scale. With Markprompt, companies can automate customer support, scale without increasing headcount, and deliver exceptional user experiences.
 
Scaling customer support with headcount is expensive, with human resources accounting for 90%+ of customer support expenses. On top of that, customer support agents often burn out leading to turnover and reduced quality. As companies grow, so does their expert knowledge, which is hard to access at scale and makes keeping employees up-to-date nearly impossible.

Markprompt addresses the root of the information access problem by indexing all available knowledge within a company, setting the foundation for a robust system of record to feed the AI. Built from the ground up with an API-first approach, Markprompt provides SDKs (such as React hooks and components) and no-code tools to enable integrations at all touchpoints in the customer journey.
hits.one_liner: AI for customer support

long_description.value:
Close customer support tickets faster with AI.

Weâ€™re building AI infrastructure to power customer support at scale. With Markprompt, companies can automate customer support, scale without increasing headcount, and deliver exceptional user experiences.

On top of that, customer support agents often burn out leading to turnover and reduced quality. hits.name: Tamarind Bio
hits.long_description:
Tamarind Bio is a website which allows researchers to use bioinformatics tools at scale using a simple interface. On Tamarind, scientists can use computational tools by simply selecting inputs instead of writing code or setting up a high performance computing environment.

Our tools have been used by hundreds of researchers, primarily at academic institutions. We currently focus on tools in structural biology, including protein structure prediction, protein design, and molecular docking. 

Get in touch at founders@tamarind.bio
hits.one_liner: No-code bioinformatics platform

hits.name: Speck
hits.long_description:
Speck is an LLM developer platform that saves time by prompt engineering directly on LLM calls.

With the Speck python package, developers can call any open-source or closed-source model with a single line change, store their prompts with our "Promptfile" format, and debug any prompt directly in the context of the app.

Our open-source package is available here: https://github.com/speckai/speck

Join our community: https://discord.com/invite/frnaYYaKj3
hits.one_liner: Livetrace debugging and metrics tracking platform for LLM apps

hits.name: Celest
hits.long_description:
Celest is a managed cloud platform for Flutter and Dart developers. We are introducing "Cloud Widgets", a set of primitives which enable you to declaratively define every piece of your backend and infrastructure in Dart.

As the role of the front-end developer evolves towards full-stack proficiency, we recognize that existing tools have fallen short for those specializing in Flutter. To address this, our platform offers a familiar experience. Using the programming language and patterns Flutter developers already when building their frontend, Celest enables developers to build and connect their apps to their backend without needing additional tooling.

We enable Flutter developers can concentrate on building features and delivering value to their customers, rather than learning additional domains and fragmenting themselves across disparate tool chains.
hits.one_liner: The Flutter cloud platform

long_description.value:
Celest is a managed cloud platform for Flutter and Dart developers. We are introducing "Cloud Widgets", a set of primitives which enable you to declaratively define every piece of your backend and infrastructure in Dart.

As the role of the front-end developer evolves towards full-stack proficiency, we recognize that existing tools have fallen short for those specializing in Flutter. To address this, our platform offers a familiar experience. Using the programming language and patterns Flutter developers already when building their frontend, Celest enables developers to build and connect their apps to their backend without needing additional tooling.

We enable Flutter developers can concentrate on building features and delivering value to their customers, rather than learning additional domains and fragmenting themselves across disparate tool chains.

hits.name: Yoneda Labs
hits.long_description:
Yoneda Labs provides software to help chemists optimise reactions. When chemists make a drug or a material, we help them figure out the best reaction parameters such as temperature, concentration and catalyst.

When Jan was working at chemical labs, he experienced the struggle of spending weeks guessing reaction conditions. We then started experimenting with ML to speed up the process.

Now, as a team of three friends from the University of Cambridge, weâ€™ve spent the last month combining our domain expertise in Computer Science, Machine Learning and Chemistry to develop state of the art models for reaction optimisation.

Although ML is becoming well established in other fields, current chemical models generalise poorly and require lots of programming experience. We make our models easily accessible to chemists in the lab.

Finding the right conditions quickly allows pharmaceutical companies to test more drugs, and finding better optima makes manufacturing process cheaper and more environmentally friendly.
hits.one_liner: Optimising Chemical Reactions

long_description.value:
Yoneda Labs provides software to help chemists optimise reactions. When chemists make a drug or a material, we help them figure out the best reaction parameters such as temperature, concentration and catalyst.

When Jan was working at chemical labs, he experienced the struggle of spending weeks guessing reaction conditions. We then started experimenting with ML to speed up the process.

Now, as a team of three friends from the University of Cambridge, weâ€™ve spent the last month combining our domain expertise in Computer Science, Machine Learning and Chemistry to develop state of the art models for reaction optimisation.

Although ML is becoming well established in other fields, current chemical models generalise poorly and require lots of programming experience. We make our models easily accessible to chemists in the lab.

Finding the right conditions quickly allows pharmaceutical companies to test more drugs, and finding better optima makes manufacturing process cheaper and more environmentally friendly.

one_liner.value: Optimising Chemical Reactions

hits.name: Artisan AI
hits.long_description:
Artisans are advanced human-like digital workers trained to do specific roles, who integrate alongside human teams. They have unique faces, names, memories & skills, and they continuously improve once they are employed, molding to each company's needs.

Our first Artisan, Ava, automates the entire outbound sales process and can be set up with a 10-minute conversation. Ava creates TCPs, prospects with her database of over 270,000,000 contacts, crafts & sends highly bespoke email sequences, and books meetings into your calendar. And, you can manage all features & settings by talking to Ava via Slack. 

Next year, we'll release a workforce of Artisans, including the Graphic Designer and Marketing Manager. Each Artisan works both with our native feature-rich software and popular external platforms.

We're not creating another SaaS product for teams to use, we're creating new team members. 

This is the next Industrial Revolution.
hits.one_liner: Creating the first human-like digital workers, called Artisans

long_description.value: Hemingway enables private dental practices to automate their scheduling. Through backend integrations with the practice's management software and LLMs, Hemingway coordinates directly with patients to handle key scheduling tasks. Core features include highly-personalized re-engagement for overdue patients, end-to-end patient tracking for arrivals and cancellations, and a frictionless intake experience for new patients. The end result is a fuller calendar and hours saved on routine tasks for practices and a seamless scheduling experience for patients.

one_liner.value: Automated Patient Scheduling for Dentists

hits.name: Momentic
hits.long_description:
Momentic enables developers to deploy AI agents to test web apps end-to-end. Developers simply describe user flows in natural language, and our AI adapts to UI changes, keeping tests updated and reliable.

Our desktop app and cloud platform speed up development and support testing at any scale in any environment, from local builds to production environments.
hits.one_liner: Deploy AI agents to test web applications using natural language.

hits.long_description: Retrieval augmented generation (RAG) is only as good as the data you put in. Reducto's API allows you to convert complex and unstructured documents and data into optimized chunks compatible with any vector database and LLM retrieval pipeline.

long_description.value: Retrieval augmented generation (RAG) is only as good as the data you put in. Reducto's API allows you to convert complex and unstructured documents and data into optimized chunks compatible with any vector database and LLM retrieval pipeline.

hits.long_description: Get insights into user behaviour and model performance by automatically grouping questions and evaluating LLM answers. Optimize your RAG pipeline by understanding how your embedded documents are used. Improve your LLM app, monitor performance and prevent hallucinations.

hits.name: Precip
hits.long_description:
Precip monitors rainfall at remote locations without needing to install weather stations. We do it by using high-resolution models that answer how much it rained in an easy to use dashboard and API.

Our platform helps customers: avoid getting stuck in mud, automatically pause irrigation after a rain, find standing water and treat it before a new batch of mosquitos are incubated, automatically assess flood damage for insurance claims, and countless other weather impacted operational decisions that canâ€™t be made with forecast data alone.
hits.one_liner: Precision rainfall tracking without gauges

long_description.value:
Precip monitors rainfall at remote locations without needing to install weather stations. We do it by using high-resolution models that answer how much it rained in an easy to use dashboard and API.

hits.name: Ubicloud
hits.long_description:
Ubicloud is an open and portable cloud. Think of it as an open alternative to cloud providers, like what Linux is to proprietary operating systems.

Our cloud services include elastic compute, block storage, and virtual networking. They can run on any bare metal provider and reduce cloud infrastructure costs by 3-10x.
hits.one_liner: Open and portable cloud

long_description.value:
Ubicloud is an open and portable cloud. Think of it as an open alternative to cloud providers, like what Linux is to proprietary operating systems.

Our cloud services include elastic compute, block storage, and virtual networking. They can run on any bare metal provider and reduce cloud infrastructure costs by 3-10x.

one_liner.value: Open and portable cloud

hits.name: Onboard AI
hits.long_description:
Onboard lets you chat with any codebase of up to 10 repos to locate and understand functionality, diagnose bugs, generate complex code changes and more. 

It is ChatGPT with real-time updated knowledge of your codebase, as well as any public/open-source library. 

You can start using Onboard with just two clicks - just sign-in with GitHub and paste-in the name of any GitHub repo. 

Onboard can also be hosted 100% on your cloud, including the AI models, so not a single line of your code ever leaves your cloud.
hits.one_liner: Private, secure AI subject-matter expert on any codebase

long_description.value:

hits.name: Lantern
hits.long_description:
Lantern is the easiest way to build AI applications using Postgres.

We started Lantern because we believe AI is going to impact every single enterprise in every single industry. We want to allow every company to tap into their unstructured data to build better applications.

With Lantern Cloud, developers have access to everything they need to build an AI application: embedding generation, vector search, efficient indexing, on top of the database they already know, Postgres.
hits.one_liner: PostgreSQL vector database extension to build AI applications

long_description.value:
Lantern is the easiest way to build AI applications using Postgres.

We started Lantern because we believe AI is going to impact every single enterprise in every single industry. We want to allow every company to tap into their unstructured data to build better applications.

With Lantern Cloud, developers have access to everything they need to build an AI application: embedding generation, vector search, efficient indexing, on top of the database they already know, Postgres.

one_liner.value: PostgreSQL vector database extension to build AI applications

hits.name: Danswer
hits.long_description:
Danswer is the AI assistant that connects to all your company tools and docs and makes finding any piece of information a breeze. Think ChatGPT, but with access to all your companies documents (only the ones you have access to, of course :P). Or, if you know Glean, you can think about it like an open-source Glean. 

Concerned about your data? Don't worry we're fully open source (MIT license) and built to be self-hosted. You can setup Danswer in your VPC in less than 30 minutes - no packets ever have to leave your cloud.

Check us out on Github: https://github.com/danswer-ai/danswer!
hits.one_liner: Open-source Glean

long_description.value:
Danswer is the AI assistant that connects to all your company tools and docs and makes finding any piece of information a breeze. Think ChatGPT, but with access to all your companies documents (only the ones you have access to, of course :P). Or, if you know Glean, you can think about it like an open-source Glean. 

Concerned about your data? Don't worry we're fully open source (MIT license) and built to be self-hosted. You can setup Danswer in your VPC in less than 30 minutes - no packets ever have to leave your cloud.

Check us out on Github: https://github.com/danswer-ai/danswer!

one_liner.value: Open-source Glean

hits.name: GovernGPT
hits.long_description:
GovernGPT reviews Marketing Materials in Real-Time using AI, like"Grammarly" but for Compliance. 

Content reviews in investment management are time-intensive, full of heavy back and forth, repeat mistakes, and inconsistency leading to slowdowns for marketing & delayed publication to investors. This process is frustrating for both author & reviewer while being a key focus of regulators such as SEC.
hits.one_liner: Compliance 'Grammarly'

long_description.value:
GovernGPT reviews Marketing Materials in Real-Time using AI, like"Grammarly" but for Compliance.

This process is frustrating for both author & reviewer while being a key focus of regulators such as SEC.
